titles.title: Cap Executive Officer Pay Act of 2009
Cap Executive Officer Pay Act of 2009
A bill to limit compensation to officers and directors of entities receiving emergency economic assistance from the Government.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Cap Executive Officer Pay Act of 2009 - Limits the annual compensation of any employee of a financial institution or other entity that receives funds under the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) established under the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 to the amount of compensation paid to the President of the United States.
